name: Town Tycoon
description:
Now is your change to be the tycoon of your own town, and grow it into a huge and bustling city.

You will not find it easy to balance the needs of your city, their food, electricity, jobs, transport and materials. But if you can, you will be rewarded with an ever growing city.

No ads, no in-app purchases means this one time purchase is all your will need. And you will get free updates with new buildings and units.

A fun game for everyone.
